computeNorm(FieldInvertState) - Method in class edu.ucla.CS246Similarity
Encodes the document length in the same way as TFIDFSimilarity.

CS246Plugin - Class in edu.ucla
 
CS246Plugin() - Constructor for class edu.ucla.CS246Plugin
 
CS246Similarity - Class in edu.ucla
A subclass of Similarity that provides a simplified API to implement a custom scoring function based on tf, idf, payload and doc-values Subclasses are only required to implement the CS246Similarity.score(edu.ucla.CS246Similarity.BasicStats, float, float, long) and CS246Similarity.toString() methods.
CS246Similarity(Settings) - Constructor for class edu.ucla.CS246Similarity
 
CS246SimilarityProvider - Class in edu.ucla

discountOverlaps - Variable in class edu.ucla.CS246Similarity
